items.sentence: Tom used to be a private investigator in Boston.
Tom used to follow Mary around like a puppy dog.
Tom used to play football before he got married.
Tom can\'t do that right now. He\'s really busy.
Tom has just opened a restaurant on Park Street.
Tom wasn\'t surprised that Mary didn\'t do that.
Were those men speaking in French or in English?
Are there any problems we need to deal with now?
Are we all really going to be on the same plane?
Are you absolutely positive you want to do this?
